name: Nova NX01
description:
Nova NX01

The starship Nova is ready for action, defends the Delta quadrant of the six dominant species that threaten the stability of the galaxy.

Specifications:

- A space shooter in 3D, controls the ship and shot independently with keyboard and mouse. Aim and shoot anything that moves!.
- Graphics and music with sci-fi atmosphere.
- Music and effects by TSODE.
- 24 levels, 40 types of enemies, 5 bosses, power-ups, 6 types of weapons.
- Game in English and Spanish.
- Mode classic game from the start, with limited Continues and better marker.
